title: Retirement Advisor: The Price Of Liberty Is An Advisor’s Vigilance
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Prowling the internet for free advice is no substitute for an advisor-client relationship, since life circumstances are always changing. This podcast (4:36) argues that just as the price of liberty is eternal vigilance, so too the price of financial freedom is the sort of vigilance provided by financial advisors. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
